name: Novek et ux., Appellants, v. Horn and Hardart Baking Company
name_abbreviation: Novek v. Horn & Hardart Baking Co.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Deew, Linn, Steen, Patteeson, Steaene and Jones, JJ.
parties: Novek et ux., Appellants, v. Horn and Hardart Baking Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on its opinion.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: I. Finhelstein, with him Joel E. Masor, for appellants.
Peter P. Liebert, 3rd, with him John J. McDevitt, 3rd, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Novek et ux., Appellants, v. Horn and Hardart Baking Company.
Argued January 4,1950.
Before Maxey, C. J., Deew, Linn, Steen, Patteeson, Steaene and Jones, JJ.
March 20, 1950:
I. Finhelstein, with him Joel E. Masor, for appellants.
Peter P. Liebert, 3rd, with him John J. McDevitt, 3rd, for appellee.
